name: part_007
file: tmp_hololive production COUNTDOWN LIVE 2022▷2023 -hololive side-【#ホロライブカウントダウン】 [n-fzN8-i3Qc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Arurandeisu, Aragami Oga, Shirakami Fubuki, and Natsuiro Matsuri continue their performance of 'DADDY ! DADDY ! DO !'.
Transition scene with motion graphics and text introducing the next collaboration between hololive and HOLOSTARS.
Rikka, Tokino Sora, and AZKi perform the song 'Wasurena' (勿忘).

subtitles.original: 君に響くわ
subtitles.english: It resonates with you

subtitles.original: 優しく微笑む度
subtitles.english: Every time you smile gently

subtitles.original: 飲み込まれて
subtitles.english: I'm swallowed up

subtitles.original: 誘われて
subtitles.english: I'm invited

subtitles.original: 未知の世界
subtitles.english: Into an unknown world

subtitles.original: 触れて
subtitles.english: Touch me

subtitles.original: Oh!
subtitles.english: Oh!

subtitles.original: DADDY! DADDY! DO!
subtitles.english: DADDY! DADDY! DO!

subtitles.original: 最後まで あなたに委ねて
subtitles.english: Entrusting myself to you until the end

subtitles.original: 壊れるなら それでもいい
subtitles.english: If I break, that's fine too

subtitles.original: もっと狂わせて
subtitles.english: Drive me more crazy

subtitles.original: 見せてくれ 僕だけに
subtitles.english: Show me, only to me

subtitles.original: 心の奥まで
subtitles.english: Deep into your heart

subtitles.original: 愛に抱かれ ギラギラ 燃えたい
subtitles.english: Embraced by love, I want to burn brightly

subtitles.original: 命果てる...
subtitles.english: Until life ends...

subtitles.original: ...夜明けまで
subtitles.english: ...until dawn

subtitles.original: Pa pa pa pa...
subtitles.english: Pa pa pa pa...

subtitles.original: Next...
subtitles.english: Next...

subtitles.original:
Special Collaboration - 1
hololive × HOLOSTARS
subtitles.english:
Special Collaboration - 1
hololive × HOLOSTARS

subtitles.original: AZKi / ときのそら / 律可
subtitles.english: AZKi / Tokino Sora / Rikka

subtitles.original: 勿忘
subtitles.english: Wasurena

subtitles.original: 例えば今君がその瞳
subtitles.english: Even if your eyes right now

subtitles.original: 作詞：atagi, PORIN 作曲：atagi, RYO NAGANO
subtitles.english: Lyrics: atagi, PORIN / Composition: atagi, RYO NAGANO

subtitles.original: 濡らしていたとしても
subtitles.english: were wet with tears,

subtitles.original: 呼ぶ声はもう聞こえない
subtitles.english: I can no longer hear the voice calling out.

subtitles.original: 絵の具を溶かすように 君との日々は
subtitles.english: Like dissolving paint, the days with you

subtitles.original: 記憶の中に滲んでいく
subtitles.english: are blurring into my memories.

subtitles.original: 何かを求めれば 何かが
subtitles.english: If I seek something, something

subtitles.original: こぼれ落ちていく そんなこの世界で
subtitles.english: will spill away, in such a world.

subtitles.original: 春の風を待つあの花のように
subtitles.english: Like that flower waiting for the spring breeze,

subtitles.original: 君という光があるのなら
subtitles.english: if there is a light called you,

subtitles.original: 巡り巡る運命を超えて
subtitles.english: crossing over the turning wheels of fate,

subtitles.original: 咲かせよう 愛の花を 花束を
subtitles.english: let's make the flowers of love bloom, a bouquet.

subtitles.original: 願いが叶うのなら 二人の世界
subtitles.english: If my wish comes true, I want to live

subtitles.original: また生きてみたい
subtitles.english: in our world once again.

subtitles.original: あのキスから芽吹く日々
subtitles.english: The days sprouting from that kiss,

subtitles.original: 見つめ直す 花びらも 香りも忘れて
subtitles.english: looking back again, forgetting the petals and scent.

subtitles.original: 君への想い 枯れていく
subtitles.english: My feelings for you are withering away.

subtitles.original: 散ってしまいそうな心に
subtitles.english: To my heart that's about to scatter,

subtitles.original: 覚えたての愛の美しさを ねえ 咲かせて
subtitles.english: please, make the beauty of love I've just learned bloom.

subtitles.original: 春の風を待つあの花のように
subtitles.english: Like that flower waiting for the spring breeze,

subtitles.original: 飾らない心でいられたら
subtitles.english: if I could be with an unadorned heart,

subtitles.original: 触れられなくても 想い煩っても
subtitles.english: even if I can't touch you, even if I'm troubled,

subtitles.original: 忘れないよ この香りを 一つずつ
subtitles.english: I won't forget this scent, one by one.
